dhp1: manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayā; manasā ce paduṭṭhena, bhāsati vā karoti vā; tato naṃ dukkhamanveti, cakkaṃva vahato padaṃ.
dhp2: manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayā; manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā; tato naṃ sukhamanveti, chāyāva anapāyinī.
dhp3: akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me; ye ca taṃ upanayhanti, veraṃ tesaṃ na sammati.
dhp4: akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me; ye ca taṃ nupanayhanti, veraṃ tesūpasammati.
dhp5: na hi verena verāni, sammantīdha kudācanaṃ; averena ca sammanti, esa dhammo sanantano.
dhp6: pare ca na vijānanti, mayamettha yamāmase; ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
dhp7: subhānupassiṃ viharantaṃ, indriyesu asaṃvutaṃ; bhojanamhi cāmattaññuṃ, kusītaṃ hīnavīriyaṃ; taṃ ve pasahati māro, vāto rukkhaṃva dubbalaṃ.
dhp8: asubhānupassiṃ viharantaṃ, indriyesu susaṃvutaṃ; bhojanamhi ca mattaññuṃ, saddhaṃ āraddhavīriyaṃ; taṃ ve nappasahati māro, vāto selaṃva pabbataṃ.
dhp9: anikkasāvo kāsāvaṃ, yo vatthaṃ paridahissati; apeto damasaccena, na so kāsāvamarahati.
dhp10: yo ca vantakasāvassa, sīlesu susamāhito; upeto damasaccena, sa ve kāsāvamarahati.
dhp11: asāre sāramatino, sāre cāsāradassino; te sāraṃ nādhigacchanti, micchāsaṅkappagocarā.
dhp12: sārañca sārato ñatvā, asārañca asārato; te sāraṃ adhigacchanti, sammāsaṅkappagocarā.
dhp13: yathā agāraṃ ducchannaṃ, vuṭṭhī samativijjhati; evaṃ abhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, rāgo samativijjhati.
dhp14: yathā agāraṃ suchannaṃ, vuṭṭhī na samativijjhati; evaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, rāgo na samativijjhati.
dhp15: idha socati pecca socati, pāpakārī ubhayattha socati; so socati so vihaññati, disvā kammakiliṭṭhamattano.
dhp16: idha modati pecca modati, katapuñño ubhayattha modati; so modati so pamodati, disvā kammavisuddhimattano.
dhp17: idha tappati pecca tappati, pāpakārī ubhayattha tappati; “ pāpaṃ me katan”ti tappati, bhiyyo tappati duggatiṃ gato.
dhp18: idha nandati pecca nandati, katapuñño ubhayattha nandati; “ puññaṃ me katan”ti nandati, bhiyyo nandati suggatiṃ gato.
dhp19: bahumpi ce saṃhita bhāsamāno, na takkaro hoti naro pamatto; gopova gāvo gaṇayaṃ paresaṃ, na bhāgavā sāmaññassa hoti.
dhp20: appampi ce saṃhita bhāsamāno, dhammassa hoti anudhammacārī; rāgañca dosañca pahāya mohaṃ, sammappajāno suvimuttacitto; anupādiyāno idha vā huraṃ vā, sa bhāgavā sāmaññassa hoti.
dhp21: appamādo amatapadaṃ, pamādo maccuno padaṃ; appamattā na mīyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā.
dhp22: evaṃ visesato ñatvā, appamādamhi paṇḍitā; appamāde pamodanti, ariyānaṃ gocare ratā.
dhp23: te jhāyino sātatikā, niccaṃ daḷhaparakkamā; phusanti dhīrā nibbānaṃ, yogakkhemaṃ anuttaraṃ.
dhp24: uṭṭhānavato satīmato, sucikammassa nisammakārino; saññatassa dhammajīvino, appamattassa yasobhivaḍḍhati.
dhp25: uṭṭhānenappamādena, saṃyamena damena ca; dīpaṃ kayirātha medhāvī, yaṃ ogho nābhikīrati.
dhp26: pamādamanuyuñjanti, bālā dummedhino janā; appamādañca medhāvī, dhanaṃ seṭṭhaṃva rakkhati.
dhp27: mā pamādamanuyuñjetha, mā kāmaratisanthavaṃ; appamatto hi jhāyanto, pappoti vipulaṃ sukhaṃ.
dhp28: pamādaṃ appamādena, yadā nudati paṇḍito; paññāpāsādamāruyha, asoko sokiniṃ pajaṃ; pabbataṭṭhova bhūmaṭṭhe, dhīro bāle avekkhati.
dhp29: appamatto pamattesu, suttesu bahujāgaro; abalassaṃva sīghasso, hitvā yāti sumedhaso.
dhp30: appamādena maghavā, devānaṃ seṭṭhataṃ gato; appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti, pamādo garahito sadā.
dhp31: appamādarato bhikkhu, pamāde bhayadassi vā; saṃyojanaṃ aṇuṃ thūlaṃ, ḍahaṃ aggīva gacchati.
dhp32: appamādarato bhikkhu, pamāde bhayadassi vā; abhabbo parihānāya, nibbānasseva santike.
dhp33: phandanaṃ capalaṃ cittaṃ, dūrakkhaṃ dunnivārayaṃ; ujuṃ karoti medhāvī, usukārova tejanaṃ.
dhp34: vārijova thale khitto, okamokataubbhato; pariphandatidaṃ cittaṃ, māradheyyaṃ pahātave.
dhp35: dunniggahassa lahuno, yatthakāmanipātino; cittassa damatho sādhu, cittaṃ dantaṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
dhp36: sududdasaṃ sunipuṇaṃ, yatthakāmanipātinaṃ; cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvī, cittaṃ guttaṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
dhp37: dūraṅgamaṃ ekacaraṃ, asarīraṃ guhāsayaṃ; ye cittaṃ saṃyamissanti, mokkhanti mārabandhanā.
dhp38: anavaṭṭhitacittassa, saddhammaṃ avijānato; pariplavapasādassa, paññā na paripūrati.
dhp39: anavassutacittassa, ananvāhatacetaso; puññapāpapahīnassa, natthi jāgarato bhayaṃ.
dhp40: kumbhūpamaṃ kāyamimaṃ viditvā, nagarūpamaṃ cittamidaṃ ṭhapetvā; yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhena, jitañca rakkhe anivesano siyā.
dhp41: aciraṃ vatayaṃ kāyo, pathaviṃ adhisessati; chuddho apetaviññāṇo, niratthaṃva kaliṅgaraṃ.
dhp42: diso disaṃ yaṃ taṃ kayirā, verī vā pana verinaṃ; micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, pāpiyo naṃ tato kare.
dhp43: na taṃ mātā pitā kayirā, aññe vāpi ca ñātakā; sammāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, seyyaso naṃ tato kare.
dhp44: ko imaṃ pathaviṃ vicessati, yamalokañca imaṃ sadevakaṃ; ko dhammapadaṃ sudesitaṃ, kusalo pupphamiva pacessati.
dhp45: sekho pathaviṃ vicessati, yamalokañca imaṃ sadevakaṃ; sekho dhammapadaṃ sudesitaṃ, kusalo pupphamiva pacessati.
dhp46: pheṇūpamaṃ kāyamimaṃ viditvā, marīcidhammaṃ abhisambudhāno; chetvāna mārassa papupphakāni, adassanaṃ maccurājassa gacche.
dhp47: pupphāni heva pacinantaṃ, byāsattamanasaṃ naraṃ; suttaṃ gāmaṃ mahoghova, maccu ādāya gacchati.
dhp48: pupphāni heva pacinantaṃ, byāsattamanasaṃ naraṃ; atittaññeva kāmesu, antako kurute vasaṃ.
dhp49: yathāpi bhamaro pupphaṃ, vaṇṇagandhamaheṭhayaṃ; paleti rasamādāya, evaṃ gāme munī care.
dhp50: na paresaṃ vilomāni, na paresaṃ katākataṃ; attanova avekkheyya, katāni akatāni ca.
dhp51: yathāpi ruciraṃ pupphaṃ, vaṇṇavantaṃ agandhakaṃ; evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, aphalā hoti akubbato.
dhp52: yathāpi ruciraṃ pupphaṃ, vaṇṇavantaṃ sagandhakaṃ; evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, saphalā hoti kubbato.
dhp53: yathāpi puppharāsimhā, kayirā mālāguṇe bahū; evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahuṃ.
dhp54: na pupphagandho paṭivātameti, na candanaṃ tagaramallikā vā; satañca gandho paṭivātameti, sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyati.
dhp55: candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpi, uppalaṃ atha vassikī; etesaṃ gandhajātānaṃ, sīlagandho anuttaro.
dhp56: appamatto ayaṃ gandho, yāyaṃ tagaracandanī; yo ca sīlavataṃ gandho, vāti devesu uttamo.
dhp57: tesaṃ sampannasīlānaṃ, appamādavihārinaṃ; sammadaññāvimuttānaṃ, māro maggaṃ na vindati.
dhp58: yathā saṅkāradhānasmiṃ, ujjhitasmiṃ mahāpathe; padumaṃ tattha jāyetha, sucigandhaṃ manoramaṃ.
dhp59: evaṃ saṅkārabhūtesu, andhabhūte puthujjane; atirocati paññāya, sammāsambuddhasāvako.
dhp60: dīghā jāgarato ratti, dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ; dīgho bālāna saṃsāro, saddhammaṃ avijānataṃ.
dhp61: carañce nādhigaccheyya, seyyaṃ sadisamattano; ekacariyaṃ daḷhaṃ kayirā, natthi bāle sahāyatā.
dhp62: puttā matthi dhanaṃ matthi, iti bālo vihaññati; attā hi attano natthi, kuto puttā kuto dhanaṃ.
dhp63: yo bālo maññati bālyaṃ, paṇḍito vāpi tena so; bālo ca paṇḍitamānī, sa ve “bālo”ti vuccati.
dhp64: yāvajīvampi ce bālo, paṇḍitaṃ payirupāsati; na so dhammaṃ vijānāti, dabbī sūparasaṃ yathā.
dhp65: muhuttamapi ce viññū, paṇḍitaṃ payirupāsati; khippaṃ dhammaṃ vijānāti, jivhā sūparasaṃ yathā.
dhp66: caranti bālā dummedhā, amitteneva attanā; karontā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, yaṃ hoti kaṭukapphalaṃ.
dhp67: na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā anutappati; yassa assumukho rodaṃ, vipākaṃ paṭisevati.
dhp68: tañca kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā nānutappati; yassa patīto sumano, vipākaṃ paṭisevati.
dhp69: madhuṃvā maññati bālo, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati; yadā ca paccati pāpaṃ, atha dukkhaṃ nigacchati.
dhp70: māse māse kusaggena, bālo bhuñjeyya bhojanaṃ; na so saṅkhātadhammānaṃ, kalaṃ agghati soḷasiṃ.
dhp71: na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, sajjukhīraṃva muccati; ḍahantaṃ bālamanveti, bhasmacchannova pāvako.
dhp72: yāvadeva anatthāya, ñattaṃ bālassa jāyati; hanti bālassa sukkaṃsaṃ, muddhamassa vipātayaṃ.
dhp73: asantaṃ bhāvanamiccheyya, purekkhārañca bhikkhusu; āvāsesu ca issariyaṃ, pūjaṃ parakulesu ca.
dhp74: mameva kata maññantu, gihī pabbajitā ubho; mamevātivasā assu, kiccākiccesu kismici; iti bālassa saṅkappo, icchā māno ca vaḍḍhati.
dhp75: aññā hi lābhūpanisā, aññā nibbānagāminī; evametaṃ abhiññāya, bhikkhu buddhassa sāvako; sakkāraṃ nābhinandeyya, vivekamanubrūhaye.
dhp76: nidhīnaṃva pavattāraṃ, yaṃ passe vajjadassinaṃ; niggayhavādiṃ medhāviṃ, tādisaṃ paṇḍitaṃ bhaje; tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
dhp77: ovadeyyānusāseyya, asabbhā ca nivāraye; satañhi so piyo hoti, asataṃ hoti appiyo.
dhp78: na bhaje pāpake mitte, na bhaje purisādhame; bhajetha mitte kalyāṇe, bhajetha purisuttame.
dhp79: dhammapīti sukhaṃ seti, vippasannena cetasā; ariyappavedite dhamme, sadā ramati paṇḍito.
dhp80: udakañhi nayanti nettikā, usukārā namayanti tejanaṃ; dāruṃ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti paṇḍitā.
dhp81: selo yathā ekaghano, vātena na samīrati; evaṃ nindāpasaṃsāsu, na samiñjanti paṇḍitā.
dhp82: yathāpi rahado gambhīro, vippasanno anāvilo; evaṃ dhammāni sutvāna, vippasīdanti paṇḍitā.
dhp83: sabbattha ve sappurisā cajanti, na kāmakāmā lapayanti santo; sukhena phuṭṭhā atha vā dukhena, na uccāvacaṃ paṇḍitā dassayanti.
dhp84: na attahetu na parassa hetu, na puttamicche na dhanaṃ na raṭṭhaṃ; na iccheyya adhammena samiddhimattano, sa sīlavā paññavā dhammiko siyā.
dhp85: appakā te manussesu, ye janā pāragāmino; athāyaṃ itarā pajā, tīramevānudhāvati.
dhp86: ye ca kho sammadakkhāte, dhamme dhammānuvattino; te janā pāramessanti, maccudheyyaṃ suduttaraṃ.
dhp87: kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāya, sukkaṃ bhāvetha paṇḍito; okā anokamāgamma, viveke yattha dūramaṃ.
dhp88: tatrābhiratimiccheyya, hitvā kāme akiñcano; pariyodapeyya attānaṃ, cittaklesehi paṇḍito.
dhp89: yesaṃ sambodhiyaṅgesu, sammā cittaṃ subhāvitaṃ; ādānapaṭinissagge, anupādāya ye ratā; khīṇāsavā jutimanto, te loke parinibbutā.
dhp90: gataddhino visokassa, vippamuttassa sabbadhi; sabbaganthappahīnassa, pariḷāho na vijjati.
dhp91: uyyuñjanti satīmanto, na nikete ramanti te; haṃsāva pallalaṃ hitvā, okamokaṃ jahanti te.
dhp92: yesaṃ sannicayo natthi, ye pariññātabhojanā; suññato animitto ca, vimokkho yesaṃ gocaro; ākāseva sakuntānaṃ, gati tesaṃ durannayā.
dhp93: yassāsavā parikkhīṇā, āhāre ca anissito; suññato animitto ca, vimokkho yassa gocaro; ākāseva sakuntānaṃ, padaṃ tassa durannayaṃ.
dhp94: yassindriyāni samathaṅgatāni, assā yathā sārathinā sudantā; pahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino.
dhp95: pathavisamo no virujjhati, indakhilupamo tādi subbato; rahadova apetakaddamo, saṃsārā na bhavanti tādino.
dhp96: santaṃ tassa manaṃ hoti, santā vācā ca kamma ca; sammadaññāvimuttassa, upasantassa tādino.
dhp97: assaddho akataññū ca, sandhicchedo ca yo naro; hatāvakāso vantāso, sa ve uttamaporiso.
dhp98: gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale; yattha arahanto viharanti, taṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ.
dhp99: ramaṇīyāni araññāni, yattha na ramatī jano; vītarāgā ramissanti, na te kāmagavesino.
dhp100: sahassamapi ce vācā, anatthapadasaṃhitā; ekaṃ atthapadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammati.
dhp101: sahassamapi ce gāthā, anatthapadasaṃhitā; ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammati.
dhp102: yo ca gāthā sataṃ bhāse, anatthapadasaṃhitā; ekaṃ dhammapadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammati.
dhp103: yo sahassaṃ sahassena, saṅgāme mānuse jine; ekañca jeyyamattānaṃ, sa ve saṅgāmajuttamo.
dhp104: attā have jitaṃ seyyo, yā cāyaṃ itarā pajā; attadantassa posassa, niccaṃ saññatacārino.
dhp105: neva devo na gandhabbo, na māro saha brahmunā; jitaṃ apajitaṃ kayirā, tathārūpassa jantuno.
dhp106: māse māse sahassena, yo yajetha sataṃ samaṃ; ekañca bhāvitattānaṃ, muhuttamapi pūjaye; sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ hutaṃ.
dhp107: yo ca vassasataṃ jantu, aggiṃ paricare vane; ekañca bhāvitattānaṃ, muhuttamapi pūjaye; sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ hutaṃ.
dhp108: yaṃ kiñci yiṭṭhaṃ va hutaṃ va loke, saṃvaccharaṃ yajetha puññapekkho; sabbampi taṃ na catubhāgameti, abhivādanā ujjugatesu seyyo.
dhp109: abhivādanasīlissa, niccaṃ vuḍḍhāpacāyino; cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ balaṃ.
dhp110: yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, dussīlo asamāhito; ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, sīlavantassa jhāyino.
dhp111: yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, duppañño asamāhito; ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, paññavantassa jhāyino.
dhp112: yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, kusīto hīnavīriyo; ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, vīriyamārabhato daḷhaṃ.
dhp113: yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ udayabbayaṃ; ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato udayabbayaṃ.
dhp114: yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ amataṃ padaṃ; ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato amataṃ padaṃ.
dhp115: yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ dhammamuttamaṃ; ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato dhammamuttamaṃ.
dhp116: abhittharetha kalyāṇe, pāpā cittaṃ nivāraye; dandhañhi karoto puññaṃ, pāpasmiṃ ramatī mano.
dhp117: pāpañce puriso kayirā, na naṃ kayirā punappunaṃ; na tamhi chandaṃ kayirātha, dukkho pāpassa uccayo.
dhp118: puññañce puriso kayirā, kayirā naṃ punappunaṃ; tamhi chandaṃ kayirātha, sukho puññassa uccayo.
dhp119: pāpopi passati bhadraṃ, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati; yadā ca paccati pāpaṃ, atha pāpo pāpāni passati.
dhp120: bhadropi passati pāpaṃ, yāva bhadraṃ na paccati; yadā ca paccati bhadraṃ, atha bhadro bhadrāni passati.
dhp121: māvamaññetha pāpassa, na mantaṃ āgamissati; udabindunipātena, udakumbhopi pūrati; bālo pūrati pāpassa, thokaṃ thokampi ācinaṃ.
dhp122: māvamaññetha puññassa, na mandaṃ āgamissati; udabindunipātena, udakumbhopi pūrati; dhīro pūrati puññassa, thokaṃ thokampi ācinaṃ.
dhp123: vāṇijova bhayaṃ maggaṃ, appasattho mahaddhano; visaṃ jīvitukāmova, pāpāni parivajjaye.
dhp124: pāṇimhi ce vaṇo nāssa, hareyya pāṇinā visaṃ; nābbaṇaṃ visamanveti, natthi pāpaṃ akubbato.
dhp125: yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati, suddhassa posassa anaṅgaṇassa; tameva bālaṃ pacceti pāpaṃ, sukhumo rajo paṭivātaṃva khitto.
dhp126: gabbhameke uppajjanti, nirayaṃ pāpakammino; saggaṃ sugatino yanti, parinibbanti anāsavā.
dhp127: na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa; na vijjatī so jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhito mucceyya pāpakammā.
dhp128: na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa; na vijjatī so jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhitaṃ nappasaheyya maccu.
dhp129: sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno; attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye.
dhp130: sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbesaṃ jīvitaṃ piyaṃ; attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye.
dhp131: sukhakāmāni bhūtāni, yo daṇḍena vihiṃsati; attano sukhamesāno, pecca so na labhate sukhaṃ.
dhp132: sukhakāmāni bhūtāni, yo daṇḍena na hiṃsati; attano sukhamesāno, pecca so labhate sukhaṃ.
dhp133: māvoca pharusaṃ kañci, vuttā paṭivadeyyu taṃ; dukkhā hi sārambhakathā, paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṃ.
dhp134: sace neresi attānaṃ, kaṃso upahato yathā; esa pattosi nibbānaṃ, sārambho te na vijjati.
dhp135: yathā daṇḍena gopālo, gāvo pājeti gocaraṃ; evaṃ jarā ca maccu ca, āyuṃ pājenti pāṇinaṃ.
dhp136: atha pāpāni kammāni, karaṃ bālo na bujjhati; sehi kammehi dummedho, aggidaḍḍhova tappati.
dhp137: yo daṇḍena adaṇḍesu, appaduṭṭhesu dussati; dasannamaññataraṃ ṭhānaṃ, khippameva nigacchati.

dhp248: evaṃ bho purisa jānāhi, pāpadhammā asaññatā; mā taṃ lobho adhammo ca, ciraṃ dukkhāya randhayuṃ.
dhp249: dadāti ve yathāsaddhaṃ, yathāpasādanaṃ jano; tattha yo ca maṅku bhavati, paresaṃ pānabhojane; na so divā vā rattiṃ vā, samādhimadhigacchati.

dhp253: paravajjānupassissa, niccaṃ ujjhānasaññino; āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā.
dhp254: ākāseva padaṃ natthi, samaṇo natthi bāhire; papañcābhiratā pajā, nippapañcā tathāgatā.
dhp255: ākāseva padaṃ natthi, samaṇo natthi bāhire; saṅkhārā sassatā natthi, natthi buddhānamiñjitaṃ.
dhp256: na tena hoti dhammaṭṭho, yenatthaṃ sāhasā naye; yo ca atthaṃ anatthañca, ubho niccheyya paṇḍito.
dhp257: asāhasena dhammena, samena nayatī pare; dhammassa gutto medhāvī, “ dhammaṭṭho”ti pavuccati.
dhp258: na tena paṇḍito hoti, yāvatā bahu bhāsati; khemī averī abhayo, “ paṇḍito”ti pavuccati.
dhp259: na tāvatā dhammadharo, yāvatā bahu bhāsati; yo ca appampi sutvāna, dhammaṃ kāyena passati; sa ve dhammadharo hoti, yo dhammaṃ nappamajjati.
dhp260: na tena thero so hoti, yenassa palitaṃ siro; paripakko vayo tassa, “ moghajiṇṇo”ti vuccati.
dhp261: yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo; sa ve vantamalo dhīro, “ thero” iti pavuccati.
dhp262: na vākkaraṇamattena, vaṇṇapokkharatāya vā; sādhurūpo naro hoti, issukī maccharī saṭho.
dhp263: yassa cetaṃ samucchinnaṃ, mūlaghaccaṃ samūhataṃ; sa vantadoso medhāvī, “ sādhurūpo”ti vuccati.
dhp264: na muṇḍakena samaṇo, abbato alikaṃ bhaṇaṃ; icchālobhasamāpanno, samaṇo kiṃ bhavissati.
dhp265: yo ca sameti pāpāni, aṇuṃthūlāni sabbaso; samitattā hi pāpānaṃ, “ samaṇo”ti pavuccati.
dhp266: na tena bhikkhu so hoti, yāvatā bhikkhate pare; vissaṃ dhammaṃ samādāya, bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā.
dhp267: yodha puññañca pāpañca, bāhetvā brahmacariyavā; saṅkhāya loke carati, sa ve “bhikkhū”ti vuccati.
dhp268: na monena munī hoti, mūḷharūpo aviddasu; yo ca tulaṃva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
dhp269: pāpāni parivajjeti, sa munī tena so muni; yo munāti ubho loke, “ muni” tena pavuccati.
dhp270: na tena ariyo hoti, yena pāṇāni hiṃsati; ahiṃsā sabbapāṇānaṃ, “ ariyo”ti pavuccati.
dhp271: na sīlabbatamattena, bāhusaccena vā pana; atha vā samādhilābhena, vivittasayanena vā.
dhp272: phusāmi nekkhammasukhaṃ, aputhujjanasevitaṃ; bhikkhu vissāsamāpādi, appatto āsavakkhayaṃ.
dhp273: maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko seṭṭho, saccānaṃ caturo padā; virāgo seṭṭho dhammānaṃ, dvipadānañca cakkhumā.
dhp274: eseva maggo natthañño, dassanassa visuddhiyā; etañhi tumhe paṭipajjatha, mārassetaṃ pamohanaṃ.

dhp328: sace labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ; abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni, careyya tenattamano satīmā.
dhp329: no ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ; rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya, eko care mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
dhp330: ekassa caritaṃ seyyo, natthi bāle sahāyatā; eko care na ca pāpāni kayirā, appossukko mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
dhp331: atthamhi jātamhi sukhā sahāyā, tuṭṭhī sukhā yā itarītarena; puññaṃ sukhaṃ jīvitasaṅkhayamhi, sabbassa dukkhassa sukhaṃ pahānaṃ.
dhp332: sukhā matteyyatā loke, atho petteyyatā sukhā; sukhā sāmaññatā loke, atho brahmaññatā sukhā.
dhp333: sukhaṃ yāva jarā sīlaṃ, sukhā saddhā patiṭṭhitā; sukho paññāya paṭilābho, pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ.
dhp334: manujassa pamattacārino, taṇhā vaḍḍhati māluvā viya; so plavatī hurā huraṃ, phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro.
dhp335: yaṃ esā sahate jammī, taṇhā loke visattikā; sokā tassa pavaḍḍhanti, abhivaṭṭhaṃva bīraṇaṃ.

dhp337: taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, yāvantettha samāgatā; taṇhāya mūlaṃ khaṇatha, usīratthova bīraṇaṃ; mā vo naḷaṃva sotova, māro bhañji punappunaṃ.

dhp369: siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvaṃ, sittā te lahumessati; chetvā rāgañca dosañca, tato nibbānamehisi.

dhp371: jhāya bhikkhu mā pamādo, mā te kāmaguṇe ramessu cittaṃ; mā lohaguḷaṃ gilī pamatto, mā kandi “dukkhamidan”ti dayhamāno.

dhp375: tatrāyamādi bhavati, idha paññassa bhikkhuno; indriyagutti santuṭṭhi, pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro.
dhp376: mitte bhajassu kalyāṇe, suddhājīve atandite; paṭisanthāravutyassa, ācārakusalo siyā; tato pāmojjabahulo, dukkhassantaṃ karissati.
dhp377: vassikā viya pupphāni, maddavāni pamuñcati; evaṃ rāgañca dosañca, vippamuñcetha bhikkhavo.
dhp378: santakāyo santavāco, santavā susamāhito; vantalokāmiso bhikkhu, “ upasanto”ti vuccati.
dhp379: attanā codayattānaṃ, paṭimaṃsetha attanā; so attagutto satimā, sukhaṃ bhikkhu vihāhisi.
dhp380: attā hi attano nātho, ko hi nātho paro siyā; attā hi attano gati, tasmā saṃyamamattānaṃ; assaṃ bhadraṃva vāṇijo.
dhp381: pāmojjabahulo bhikkhu, pasanno buddhasāsane; adhigacche padaṃ santaṃ, saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukhaṃ.
dhp382: yo have daharo bhikkhu, yuñjati buddhasāsane; somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā.
dhp383: chinda sotaṃ parakkamma, kāme panuda brāhmaṇa; saṅkhārānaṃ khayaṃ ñatvā, akataññūsi brāhmaṇa.
dhp384: yadā dvayesu dhammesu, pāragū hoti brāhmaṇo; athassa sabbe saṃyogā, atthaṃ gacchanti jānato.
dhp385: yassa pāraṃ apāraṃ vā, pārāpāraṃ na vijjati; vītaddaraṃ visaṃyuttaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp386: jhāyiṃ virajamāsīnaṃ, katakiccamanāsavaṃ; uttamatthamanuppattaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp387: divā tapati ādicco, rattimābhāti candimā; sannaddho khattiyo tapati, jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇo; atha sabbamahorattiṃ, buddho tapati tejasā.
dhp388: bāhitapāpoti brāhmaṇo, samacariyā samaṇoti vuccati; pabbājayamattano malaṃ, tasmā “pabbajito”ti vuccati.
dhp389: na brāhmaṇassa pahareyya, nāssa muñcetha brāhmaṇo; dhī brāhmaṇassa hantāraṃ, tato dhī yassa muñcati.
dhp390: na brāhmaṇassetadakiñci seyyo, yadā nisedho manaso piyehi; yato yato hiṃsamano nivattati, tato tato sammatimeva dukkhaṃ.
dhp391: yassa kāyena vācāya, manasā natthi dukkaṭaṃ; saṃvutaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp392: yamhā dhammaṃ vijāneyya, sammāsambuddhadesitaṃ; sakkaccaṃ taṃ namasseyya, aggihuttaṃva brāhmaṇo.
dhp393: na jaṭāhi na gottena, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo; yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, so sucī so ca brāhmaṇo.
dhp394: kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā; abbhantaraṃ te gahanaṃ, bāhiraṃ parimajjasi.
dhp395: paṃsukūladharaṃ jantuṃ, kisaṃ dhamanisanthataṃ; ekaṃ vanasmiṃ jhāyantaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp396: na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūmi, yonijaṃ mattisambhavaṃ; bhovādi nāma so hoti, sace hoti sakiñcano; akiñcanaṃ anādānaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp397: sabbasaṃyojanaṃ chetvā, yo ve na paritassati; saṅgātigaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp398: chetvā naddhiṃ varattañca, sandānaṃ sahanukkamaṃ; ukkhittapalighaṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp399: akkosaṃ vadhabandhañca, aduṭṭho yo titikkhati; khantībalaṃ balānīkaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp400: akkodhanaṃ vatavantaṃ, sīlavantaṃ anussadaṃ; dantaṃ antimasārīraṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp401: vāri pokkharapatteva, āraggeriva sāsapo; yo na limpati kāmesu, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp402: yo dukkhassa pajānāti, idheva khayamattano; pannabhāraṃ visaṃyuttaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp403: gambhīrapaññaṃ medhāviṃ, maggāmaggassa kovidaṃ; uttamatthamanuppattaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp404: asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ gahaṭṭhehi, anāgārehi cūbhayaṃ; anokasārimappicchaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp405: nidhāya daṇḍaṃ bhūtesu, tasesu thāvaresu ca; yo na hanti na ghāteti, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp406: aviruddhaṃ viruddhesu, attadaṇḍesu nibbutaṃ; sādānesu anādānaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp407: yassa rāgo ca doso ca, māno makkho ca pātito; sāsaporiva āraggā, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp408: akakkasaṃ viññāpaniṃ, giraṃ saccamudīraye; yāya nābhisaje kañci, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp409: yodha dīghaṃ va rassaṃ vā, aṇuṃ thūlaṃ subhāsubhaṃ; loke adinnaṃ nādiyati, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp410: āsā yassa na vijjanti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca; nirāsāsaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp411: yassālayā na vijjanti, aññāya akathaṅkathī; amatogadhamanuppattaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp412: yodha puññañca pāpañca, ubho saṅgamupaccagā; asokaṃ virajaṃ suddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp413: candaṃva vimalaṃ suddhaṃ, vippasannamanāvilaṃ; nandībhavaparikkhīṇaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp414: yomaṃ palipathaṃ duggaṃ, saṃsāraṃ mohamaccagā; tiṇṇo pāraṅgato jhāyī, anejo akathaṃkathī; anupādāya nibbuto, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp415: yodha kāme pahantvāna, anāgāro paribbaje; kāmabhavaparikkhīṇaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp416: yodha taṇhaṃ pahantvāna, anāgāro paribbaje; taṇhābhavaparikkhīṇaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp417: hitvā mānusakaṃ yogaṃ, dibbaṃ yogaṃ upaccagā; sabbayogavisaṃyuttaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp418: hitvā ratiñca aratiñca, sītibhūtaṃ nirūpadhiṃ; sabbalokābhibhuṃ vīraṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp419: cutiṃ yo vedi sattānaṃ, upapattiñca sabbaso; asattaṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp420: yassa gatiṃ na jānanti, devā gandhabbamānusā; khīṇāsavaṃ arahantaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp421: yassa pure ca pacchā ca, majjhe ca natthi kiñcanaṃ; akiñcanaṃ anādānaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp422: usabhaṃ pavaraṃ vīraṃ, mahesiṃ vijitāvinaṃ; anejaṃ nhātakaṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
dhp423: pubbenivāsaṃ yo vedi, saggāpāyañca passati; atho jātikkhayaṃ patto, abhiññāvosito muni; sabbavositavosānaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
